issue.title: [CF 1035] Shroud of Con - timer
issue.body:
Hi, I was wondering if you were able to assist me to get Shroud of Concealment timer working.

I'm not a rogue, but I plan on doing 2's with a rogue, and when he pops Shroud of Concealment, I use Tell Me When to track it.

Even though I click the timer option, when the rogue pops SoC, TMW does track it, but the timer won't work, so it's only ever either on or off.

I'd like to try and get the timer working so I can tell how long it has to go before the SoC dissipates.

Is there anyway to track SoC with the timer on myself?

Was thinking, if it possibly bypasses the issue, should I be tracking it on the actual rogue that pops it? That would help me in arena with my rogue partner, but not for bg's and stuff in general.

Any help / assistance would be greatly appreciated.


> Posted by CurseForge user icehawk15 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1035 | Raw

comments.body:

Hope this is enough to see if this can be solved. Thanks.
